line.text: %HAVOK%: Good luck, guys. I'm gettin' outta here. There's way too many anti-aircraft guns on these platforms.
%PROFX%: Thank you, Havok. You braved a great deal to get the team to the landing zone.

%PROFX%: And because the platforms are much more heavily fortified than first believed, I've requested the aid of SHIELD. They can better secure the structures once the defenses are down. Plus, they have a more thorough reconnaissance of the area.  And with that, I hand control of this mission over to Colonel Nick Fury.
%NICKFURY%: Thank you, Professor Xavier. Team, some of you I've worked with before, others of you I've fought with. But lives are on the line so there's no time for egos right now.

%NICKFURY%: At this very moment a team of SHIELD agents are on their way to your location. It is imperative that you destroy the anti-aircraft guns before my men arrive. If you don't, they'll be shot out of the sky. Time is the enemy here. Move fast, Fury out.
